There are two parts to your questions; firstly is that the aspect of masturbation is not permitted in Islam.

As for the second part the fact that you are masturbating does not effect the death of another person or can cause them any harm all that happens to us is from Allah and not by your actions. We will be accountable for our actions. It is only Allah that can give and take life. So your action of masturbation (which is not permitted) is not your fault.
